sentences: He left the band for personal reasons, but still performs periodically with the band, including full-time during their 2011 Euro Tour.
Hammond recorded/engineered and produced Chicago band Out For Hours first full-length album titled Save Today Tomorrow.
Hammond now is currently recording with Jonny Radtke (ex-Kill Hannah guitarist) in Radtke's new solo project, Polar Moon.
He also records with David Martorana at FAT RECORDING STUDIO in Illinois and does some tours with Kill Hannah.
